name: Rebuffing Reduction
text: Your damage reduction can turn the force of blows back on your enemies.
prerequisites: Str 13, damage reduction, Improved Bull Rush, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.
benefit: Whenever an opponent that is adjacent to you fails to penetrate your DR with a melee attack, you can spend an immediate action to attempt a bull rush combat maneuver against that opponent. If you succeed, you cannot move with the opponent.
normal: A bull rush combat maneuver is a standard action.
staminaText: When you succeed at a bull rush combat maneuver check with this feat, you can spend 2 stamina points to move up to 5 feet with the target.
text_zh: 你坚固的身躯可以将敌人的攻击力道悉数弹回。
prerequisites_zh: 力量13，伤害减免能力，精通冲撞，猛力攻击，BAB+1。
benefit_zh: 当一个敌人的一次近战攻击没能穿透你的伤害减免，你可以花费直觉动作对其进行一次冲撞战技检定。如果成功，你不会也不能随着该敌人一起移动。
normal_zh: 冲撞战技检定是一个标准动作。
staminaText_zh: 当你在使用这个专长成功通过冲撞战技检定时，你可以消耗2点耐力来和目标一起移动至多5尺。
